00072 static void init_preview_region(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00073 {
00074     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00075 
00076     ar->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_PREVIEW;
00077     ar->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_TOP;
00078     ar->flag |= RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN;
00079 
00080     ar->v2d.tot.xmin = 0.0f;
00081     ar->v2d.tot.ymin = -10.0f;
00082     ar->v2d.tot.xmax = (float)scene->r.efra;
00083     ar->v2d.tot.ymax = 10.0f;
00084 
00085     ar->v2d.cur = ar->v2d.tot;
00086 
00087     ar->v2d.min[0] = FLT_MIN;
00088     ar->v2d.min[1] = FLT_MIN;
00089 
00090     ar->v2d.max[0] = MAXFRAMEF;
00091     ar->v2d.max[1] = FLT_MAX;
00092 
00093     ar->v2d.scroll = (V2D_SCROLL_BOTTOM|V2D_SCROLL_SCALE_HORIZONTAL);
00094     ar->v2d.scroll |= (V2D_SCROLL_LEFT|V2D_SCROLL_SCALE_VERTICAL);
00095 
00096     ar->v2d.keeptot = 0;
00097 }
00098 
00099 static ARegion *clip_has_preview_region(const bContext *C, ScrArea *sa)
00100 {
00101     ARegion *ar, *arnew;
00102 
00103     ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_PREVIEW);
00104     if (ar)
00105         return ar;
00106 
00107     /* add subdiv level; after header */
00108     ar = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_WINDOW);
00109 
00110     /* is error! */
00111     if (ar == NULL)
00112         return NULL;
00113 
00114     arnew = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "clip preview region");
00115 
00116     BLI_insertlinkbefore(&sa->regionbase, ar, arnew);
00117     init_preview_region(C, arnew);
00118 
00119     return arnew;
00120 }
00121 
00122 static void clip_scopes_tag_refresh(ScrArea *sa)
00123 {
00124     SpaceClip *sc = (SpaceClip *)sa->spacedata.first;
00125     ARegion *ar;
00126 
00127     if (sc->mode != SC_MODE_TRACKING)
00128         return;
00129 
00130     /* only while proeprties are visible */
00131     for (ar = sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar = ar->next) {
00132         if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_UI && ar->flag & RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN)
00133             return;
00134     }
00135 
00136     sc->scopes.ok = FALSE;
00137 }
00138 
00139 static void clip_stabilization_tag_refresh(ScrArea *sa)
00140 {
00141     SpaceClip *sc = (SpaceClip *) sa->spacedata.first;
00142     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00143 
00144     if (clip) {
00145         MovieTrackingStabilization *stab = &clip->tracking.stabilization;
00146 
00147         stab->ok = FALSE;
00148     }
00149 }

00151 /* ******************** default callbacks for clip space ***************** */
00152 
00153 static SpaceLink *clip_new(const bContext *C)
00154 {
00155     ARegion *ar;
00156     SpaceClip *sc;
00157 
00158     sc = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SpaceClip), "initclip");
00159     sc->spacetype = SPACE_CLIP;
00160     sc->flag = SC_SHOW_MARKER_PATTERN|SC_SHOW_TRACK_PATH|SC_MANUAL_CALIBRATION|SC_SHOW_GRAPH_TRACKS|SC_SHOW_GRAPH_FRAMES;
00161     sc->zoom = 1.0f;
00162     sc->path_length = 20;
00163     sc->scopes.track_preview_height = 120;
00164 
00165     /* header */
00166     ar = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "header for clip");
00167 
00168     BLI_addtail(&sc->regionbase, ar);
00169     ar->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_HEADER;
00170     ar->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_BOTTOM;
00171 
00172     /* tools view */
00173     ar = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "tools for clip");
00174 
00175     BLI_addtail(&sc->regionbase, ar);
00176     ar->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_TOOLS;
00177     ar->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_LEFT;
00178 
00179     /* tool properties */
00180     ar = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "tool properties for clip");
00181 
00182     BLI_addtail(&sc->regionbase, ar);
00183     ar->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_TOOL_PROPS;
00184     ar->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_BOTTOM|RGN_SPLIT_PREV;
00185 
00186     /* properties view */
00187     ar = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "properties for clip");
00188 
00189     BLI_addtail(&sc->regionbase, ar);
00190     ar->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_UI;
00191     ar->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_RIGHT;
00192 
00193     /* preview view */
00194     ar = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "preview for clip");
00195 
00196     BLI_addtail(&sc->regionbase, ar);
00197     init_preview_region(C, ar);
00198 
00199     /* main area */
00200     ar = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegion), "main area for clip");
00201 
00202     BLI_addtail(&sc->regionbase, ar);
00203     ar->regiontype = RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
00204 
00205     return (SpaceLink *) sc;
00206 }
00207 
00208 /* not spacelink itself */
00209 static void clip_free(SpaceLink *sl)
00210 {
00211     SpaceClip *sc = (SpaceClip*) sl;
00212 
00213     sc->clip = NULL;
00214 
00215     if (sc->scopes.track_preview)
00216         IMB_freeImBuf(sc->scopes.track_preview);
00217 }

00219 /* spacetype; init callback */
00220 static void clip_init(struct wmWindowManager *UNUSED(wm), ScrArea *UNUSED(sa))
00221 {
00222 
00223 }
00224 
00225 static SpaceLink *clip_duplicate(SpaceLink *sl)
00226 {
00227     SpaceClip *scn = MEM_dupallocN(sl);
00228 
00229     /* clear or remove stuff from old */
00230     scn->scopes.track_preview = NULL;
00231     scn->scopes.ok = FALSE;
00232 
00233     return (SpaceLink *)scn;
00234 }
00235 
00236 static void clip_listener(ScrArea *sa, wmNotifier *wmn)
00237 {
00238     /* context changes */
00239     switch(wmn->category) {
00240         case NC_SCENE:
00241             switch(wmn->data) {
00242                 case ND_FRAME:
00243                     clip_scopes_tag_refresh(sa);
00244                     /* no break! */
00245 
00246                 case ND_FRAME_RANGE:
00247                     ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00248                     break;
00249             }
00250             break;
00251         case NC_MOVIECLIP:
00252             switch(wmn->data) {
00253                 case ND_DISPLAY:
00254                 case ND_SELECT:
00255                     clip_scopes_tag_refresh(sa);
00256                     ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00257                     break;
00258             }
00259             switch(wmn->action) {
00260                 case NA_REMOVED:
00261                 case NA_EDITED:
00262                 case NA_EVALUATED:
00263                     clip_stabilization_tag_refresh(sa);
00264                     /* no break! */
00265 
00266                 case NA_SELECTED:
00267                     clip_scopes_tag_refresh(sa);
00268                     ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00269                     break;
00270             }
00271             break;
00272         case NC_GEOM:
00273             switch(wmn->data) {
00274                 case ND_SELECT:
00275                     clip_scopes_tag_refresh(sa);
00276                     ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00277                     break;
00278             }
00279             break;
00280          case NC_SCREEN:
00281             if (wmn->data ==ND_ANIMPLAY) {
00282                 ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00283             }
00284             break;
00285         case NC_SPACE:
00286             if (wmn->data ==ND_SPACE_CLIP) {
00287                 clip_scopes_tag_refresh(sa);
00288                 clip_stabilization_tag_refresh(sa);
00289                 ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00290             }
00291             break;
00292     }
00293 }

00396 static void clip_keymap(struct wmKeyConfig *keyconf)
00397 {
00398     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00399     wmKeyMapItem *kmi;
00400 
00401     /* ******** Global hotkeys avalaible for all regions ******** */
00402 
00403     keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Clip", SPACE_CLIP, 0);
00404 
00405     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_open", OKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00406 
00407     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_tools", TKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00408     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_properties", NKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00409 
00410     /* 2d tracking */
00411     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_track_markers", LEFTARROWKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00412     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "backwards", TRUE);
00413     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "sequence", FALSE);
00414     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_track_markers", RIGHTARROWKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_ALT, 0);
00415     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "backwards", FALSE);
00416     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "sequence", FALSE);
00417     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_track_markers", TKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00418     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "backwards", FALSE);
00419     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "sequence", TRUE);
00420     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_track_markers", TKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT|KM_CTRL, 0);
00421     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "backwards", TRUE);
00422     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "sequence", TRUE);
00423 
00424     /* mode */
00425     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_mode_set", TABKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00426     RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "mode", SC_MODE_RECONSTRUCTION);
00427     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "toggle", TRUE);
00428 
00429     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_mode_set", TABKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00430     RNA_enum_set(kmi->ptr, "mode", SC_MODE_DISTORTION);
00431     RNA_boolean_set(kmi->ptr, "toggle", TRUE);
00432 
00433     kmi = WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "WM_OT_context_toggle_enum", ZKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00434     RNA_string_set(kmi->ptr, "data_path", "space_data.view");
00435     RNA_string_set(kmi->ptr, "value_1", "CLIP");
00436     RNA_string_set(kmi->ptr, "value_2", "GRAPH");
00437 
00438     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_solve_camera", SKEY, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00439 
00440     /* ******** Hotkeys avalaible for main region only ******** */
00441 
00442     keymap = WM_keymap_find(keyconf, "Clip Editor", SPACE_CLIP, 0);
00443 
00444     /* ** View/navigation ** */
00445 
00446     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_pan", MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00447     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_pan", MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0);
00448     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_pan", MOUSEPAN, 0, 0, 0);
00449 
00450     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_zoom", MIDDLEMOUSE, KM_PRESS, KM_CTRL, 0);
00451     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_zoom", MOUSEZOOM, 0, 0, 0);
00452     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_zoom_in", WHEELINMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00453     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_zoom_out", WHEELOUTMOUSE, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00454     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_zoom_in", PADPLUSKEY, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00455     WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_zoom_out", PADMINUS, KM_PRESS, 0, 0);
00456 
00457     RNA_float_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_zoom_ratio", PAD8, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0)->ptr, "ratio", 8.0f);
00458     RNA_float_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_zoom_ratio", PAD4, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0)->ptr, "ratio", 4.0f);
00459     RNA_float_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_zoom_ratio", PAD2, KM_PRESS, KM_SHIFT, 0)->ptr, "ratio", 2.0f);
00460     RNA_float_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_zoom_ratio", PAD1, KM_PRESS, 0, 0)->ptr, "ratio", 1.0f);
00461     RNA_float_set(WM_keymap_add_item(keymap, "CLIP_OT_view_zoom_ratio", PAD2, KM_PRESS, 0, 0)->ptr, "ratio", 0.5f);

00464

00500

00613 
00614 const char *clip_context_dir[]= {"edit_movieclip", NULL};
00615 
00616 static int clip_context(const bContext *C, const char *member, bContextDataResult *result)
00617 {
00618     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00619 
00620     if (CTX_data_dir(member)) {
00621         CTX_data_dir_set(result, clip_context_dir);
00622         return TRUE;
00623     }
00624     else if (CTX_data_equals(member, "edit_movieclip")) {
00625         CTX_data_id_pointer_set(result, &sc->clip->id);
00626         return TRUE;
00627     }
00628 
00629     return FALSE;
00630 }
00631 
00632 static void clip_refresh(const bContext *C, ScrArea *sa)
00633 {
00634     wmWindowManager *wm = CTX_wm_manager(C);
00635     wmWindow *window = CTX_wm_window(C);
00636     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00637     SpaceClip *sc = (SpaceClip *)sa->spacedata.first;
00638     ARegion *ar_main = BKE_area_find_region_type(sa, RGN_TYPE_WINDOW);
00639     ARegion *ar_preview = clip_has_preview_region(C, sa);
00640     int view_changed = FALSE;
00641 
00642     switch (sc->view) {
00643         case SC_VIEW_CLIP:
00644             if (ar_preview && !(ar_preview->flag & RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN)) {
00645                 ar_preview->flag |= RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN;
00646                 ar_preview->v2d.flag &= ~V2D_IS_INITIALISED;
00647                 WM_event_remove_handlers((bContext*)C, &ar_preview->handlers);
00648                 view_changed = TRUE;
00649             }
00650             if (ar_main && ar_main->alignment != RGN_ALIGN_NONE) {
00651                 ar_main->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_NONE;
00652                 view_changed = TRUE;
00653             }
00654             if (ar_preview && ar_preview->alignment != RGN_ALIGN_NONE) {
00655                 /* store graph region align */
00656                 if (ar_preview->alignment == RGN_ALIGN_TOP)
00657                     sc->runtime_flag &= ~SC_GRAPH_BOTTOM;
00658                 else
00659                     sc->runtime_flag |= SC_GRAPH_BOTTOM;
00660 
00661                 ar_preview->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_NONE;
00662                 view_changed = TRUE;
00663             }
00664             break;
00665         case SC_VIEW_GRAPH:
00666             if (ar_preview && (ar_preview->flag & RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN)) {
00667                 ar_preview->flag &= ~RGN_FLAG_HIDDEN;
00668                 ar_preview->v2d.flag &= ~V2D_IS_INITIALISED;
00669                 ar_preview->v2d.cur = ar_preview->v2d.tot;
00670                 view_changed = TRUE;
00671             }
00672             if (ar_main && ar_main->alignment != RGN_ALIGN_NONE) {
00673                 ar_main->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_NONE;
00674                 view_changed = TRUE;
00675             }
00676             if (ar_preview && !ELEM(ar_preview->alignment, RGN_ALIGN_TOP,  RGN_ALIGN_BOTTOM)) {
00677                 if (sc->runtime_flag & SC_GRAPH_BOTTOM)
00678                     ar_preview->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_BOTTOM;
00679                 else
00680                     ar_preview->alignment = RGN_ALIGN_TOP;
00681 
00682                 view_changed = TRUE;
00683             }
00684             break;
00685     }
00686 
00687     if (view_changed) {
00688         ED_area_initialize(wm, window, sa);
00689         ED_area_tag_redraw(sa);
00690     }
00691 
00692     BKE_movieclip_user_set_frame(&sc->user, scene->r.cfra);
00693 }
00694 
00695 /********************* main region ********************/
00696 
00697 /* sets up the fields of the View2D from zoom and offset */
00698 static void movieclip_main_area_set_view2d(SpaceClip *sc, ARegion *ar)
00699 {
00700     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00701     float x1, y1, w, h;
00702     int width, height, winx, winy;
00703 
00704     ED_space_clip_size(sc, &width, &height);
00705 
00706     w = width;
00707     h = height;
00708 
00709     if (clip)
00710         h *= clip->aspy / clip->aspx / clip->tracking.camera.pixel_aspect;
00711 
00712     winx = ar->winrct.xmax - ar->winrct.xmin + 1;
00713     winy = ar->winrct.ymax - ar->winrct.ymin + 1;
00714 
00715     ar->v2d.tot.xmin = 0;
00716     ar->v2d.tot.ymin = 0;
00717     ar->v2d.tot.xmax = w;
00718     ar->v2d.tot.ymax = h;
00719 
00720     ar->v2d.mask.xmin = ar->v2d.mask.ymin = 0;
00721     ar->v2d.mask.xmax = winx;
00722     ar->v2d.mask.ymax = winy;
00723 
00724     /* which part of the image space do we see? */
00725     x1= ar->winrct.xmin + (winx-sc->zoom * w) / 2.0f;
00726     y1= ar->winrct.ymin + (winy-sc->zoom * h) / 2.0f;
00727 
00728     x1-= sc->zoom * sc->xof;
00729     y1-= sc->zoom * sc->yof;
00730 
00731     /* relative display right */
00732     ar->v2d.cur.xmin = (ar->winrct.xmin - (float)x1) / sc->zoom;
00733     ar->v2d.cur.xmax = ar->v2d.cur.xmin + ((float)winx / sc->zoom);
00734 
00735     /* relative display left */
00736     ar->v2d.cur.ymin = (ar->winrct.ymin - (float)y1) / sc->zoom;
00737     ar->v2d.cur.ymax = ar->v2d.cur.ymin + ((float)winy / sc->zoom);
00738 
00739     /* normalize 0.0..1.0 */
00740     ar->v2d.cur.xmin /= w;
00741     ar->v2d.cur.xmax /= w;
00742     ar->v2d.cur.ymin /= h;
00743     ar->v2d.cur.ymax /= h;
00744 }
00745 
00746 /* add handlers, stuff you only do once or on area/region changes */
00747 static void clip_main_area_init(wmWindowManager *wm, ARegion *ar)
00748 {
00749     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00750 
00751     UI_view2d_region_reinit(&ar->v2d, V2D_COMMONVIEW_STANDARD, ar->winx, ar->winy);
00752 
00753     /* own keymap */
00754     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Clip", SPACE_CLIP, 0);
00755     WM_event_add_keymap_handler_bb(&ar->handlers, keymap, &ar->v2d.mask, &ar->winrct);
00756 
00757     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Clip Editor", SPACE_CLIP, 0);
00758     WM_event_add_keymap_handler_bb(&ar->handlers, keymap, &ar->v2d.mask, &ar->winrct);
00759 }
00760 
00761 static void clip_main_area_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00762 {
00763     /* draw entirely, view changes should be handled here */
00764     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00765     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00766     MovieClip *clip = ED_space_clip(sc);
00767 
00768     /* if tracking is in progress, we should synchronize framenr from clipuser
00769      * so latest tracked frame would be shown */
00770     if (clip && clip->tracking_context)
00771         BKE_tracking_sync_user(&sc->user, clip->tracking_context);
00772 
00773     if (sc->flag & SC_LOCK_SELECTION) {
00774         ImBuf *tmpibuf = NULL;
00775 
00776         if (clip && clip->tracking.stabilization.flag & TRACKING_2D_STABILIZATION) {
00777             tmpibuf = ED_space_clip_get_stable_buffer(sc, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00778         }
00779 
00780         if (ED_clip_view_selection(sc, ar, 0)) {
00781             sc->xof += sc->xlockof;
00782             sc->yof += sc->ylockof;
00783         }
00784 
00785         if (tmpibuf)
00786             IMB_freeImBuf(tmpibuf);
00787     }
00788 
00789     /* clear and setup matrix */
00790     UI_ThemeClearColor(TH_BACK);
00791     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00792 
00793     /* data... */
00794     movieclip_main_area_set_view2d(sc, ar);
00795 
00796     clip_draw_main(sc, ar, scene);
00797 
00798     /* Grease Pencil */
00799     clip_draw_grease_pencil((bContext *)C, 1);
00800 
00801     /* reset view matrix */
00802     UI_view2d_view_restore(C);
00803 
00804     /* draw Grease Pencil - screen space only */
00805     clip_draw_grease_pencil((bContext *)C, 0);
00806 }
00807 
00808 static void clip_main_area_listener(ARegion *ar, wmNotifier *wmn)
00809 {
00810     /* context changes */
00811     switch(wmn->category) {
00812         case NC_SCREEN:
00813             if (wmn->data == ND_GPENCIL)
00814                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00815         break;
00816     }
00817 }
00818 
00819 /****************** preview region ******************/
00820 
00821 static void clip_preview_area_init(wmWindowManager *wm, ARegion *ar)
00822 {
00823     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00824 
00825     UI_view2d_region_reinit(&ar->v2d, V2D_COMMONVIEW_CUSTOM, ar->winx, ar->winy);
00826 
00827     /* own keymap */
00828     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Clip", SPACE_CLIP, 0);
00829     WM_event_add_keymap_handler_bb(&ar->handlers, keymap, &ar->v2d.mask, &ar->winrct);
00830 
00831     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Clip Graph Editor", SPACE_CLIP, 0);
00832     WM_event_add_keymap_handler_bb(&ar->handlers, keymap, &ar->v2d.mask, &ar->winrct);
00833 }
00834 
00835 static void clip_preview_area_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00836 {
00837     View2D *v2d = &ar->v2d;
00838     View2DScrollers *scrollers;
00839     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00840     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C);
00841     short unitx = V2D_UNIT_FRAMESCALE, unity = V2D_UNIT_VALUES;
00842 
00843     if (sc->flag & SC_LOCK_TIMECURSOR)
00844         ED_clip_graph_center_current_frame(scene, ar);
00845 
00846     /* clear and setup matrix */
00847     UI_ThemeClearColor(TH_BACK);
00848     glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT);
00849 
00850     UI_view2d_view_ortho(v2d);
00851 
00852     /* data... */
00853     clip_draw_graph(sc, ar, scene);
00854 
00855     /* reset view matrix */
00856     UI_view2d_view_restore(C);
00857 
00858     /* scrollers */
00859     scrollers = UI_view2d_scrollers_calc(C, v2d, unitx, V2D_GRID_NOCLAMP, unity, V2D_GRID_NOCLAMP);
00860     UI_view2d_scrollers_draw(C, v2d, scrollers);
00861     UI_view2d_scrollers_free(scrollers);
00862 }
00863 
00864 static void clip_preview_area_listener(ARegion *UNUSED(ar), wmNotifier *UNUSED(wmn))
00865 {
00866 }

00893 
00894 /****************** tool properties region ******************/
00895 
00896 static void clip_props_area_listener(ARegion *ar, wmNotifier *wmn)
00897 {
00898     /* context changes */
00899     switch(wmn->category) {
00900         case NC_WM:
00901             if (wmn->data == ND_HISTORY)
00902                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00903             break;
00904         case NC_SCENE:
00905             if (wmn->data == ND_MODE)
00906                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00907             break;
00908         case NC_SPACE:
00909             if (wmn->data == ND_SPACE_CLIP)
00910                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00911             break;
00912         case NC_SCREEN:
00913             if (wmn->data == ND_GPENCIL)
00914                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00915             break;
00916     }
00917 }
00918 
00919 /****************** properties region ******************/
00920 
00921 /* add handlers, stuff you only do once or on area/region changes */
00922 static void clip_properties_area_init(wmWindowManager *wm, ARegion *ar)
00923 {
00924     wmKeyMap *keymap;
00925 
00926     ED_region_panels_init(wm, ar);
00927 
00928     keymap = WM_keymap_find(wm->defaultconf, "Clip", SPACE_CLIP, 0);
00929     WM_event_add_keymap_handler(&ar->handlers, keymap);
00930 }
00931 
00932 static void clip_properties_area_draw(const bContext *C, ARegion *ar)
00933 {
00934     SpaceClip *sc = CTX_wm_space_clip(C);
00935 
00936     BKE_movieclip_update_scopes(sc->clip, &sc->user, &sc->scopes);
00937 
00938     ED_region_panels(C, ar, 1, NULL, -1);
00939 }
00940 
00941 static void clip_properties_area_listener(ARegion *ar, wmNotifier *wmn)
00942 {
00943     /* context changes */
00944     switch(wmn->category) {
00945         case NC_SCREEN:
00946             if (wmn->data ==ND_GPENCIL)
00947                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00948             break;
00949         case NC_BRUSH:
00950             if (wmn->action ==NA_EDITED)
00951                 ED_region_tag_redraw(ar);
00952             break;
00953     }
00954 }
00955 
00956 /********************* registration ********************/
00957 
00958 /* only called once, from space/spacetypes.c */
00959 void ED_spacetype_clip(void)
00960 {
00961     SpaceType *st = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SpaceType), "spacetype clip");
00962     ARegionType *art;
00963 
00964     st->spaceid = SPACE_CLIP;
00965     strncpy(st->name, "Clip", BKE_ST_MAXNAME);
00966 
00967     st->new = clip_new;
00968     st->free = clip_free;
00969     st->init = clip_init;
00970     st->duplicate = clip_duplicate;
00971     st->operatortypes = clip_operatortypes;
00972     st->keymap = clip_keymap;
00973     st->listener = clip_listener;
00974     st->context = clip_context;
00975     st->refresh = clip_refresh;
00976 
00977     /* regions: main window */
00978     art = MEM_callocN(sizeof(ARegionType), "spacetype clip region");
00979     art->regionid = RGN_TYPE_WINDOW;
00980     art->init = clip_main_area_init;
00981     art->draw = clip_main_area_draw;
00982     art->listener = clip_main_area_listener;
00983     art->keymapflag = ED_KEYMAP_FRAMES|ED_KEYMAP_UI|ED_KEYMAP_GPENCIL;
00984 
00985     BLI_addhead(&st->regiontypes, art);
00986

01043 
01044     BKE_spacetype_register(st);
